column3: Latest; PHNOM PENH: A young woman was killed by her boyfriend because of his jealousy. He then attempted suicide
column4: (*EDIT: photos show he slashed his own throat with a small knife) but was found by police and taken to Calmette hospital. His condition is unknown.------ The shocking incident took place on the morning of January 14
column5: 2020 in a rented room near Salang Market in the village of Boeng Salang
column6: Russey Keo district.------The victim has been named as Sok Srey Si
